summary: SERVICE SHIFTER LIGHT CAME ON AND GEAR SHIFT LIGHTS ARE ALL RED,P,R,N,D. THEY STAY LITE UP. IT HAPPENS WHEN I SHIFT GEARS. IT DOESN'T MATTER IF I SHIFT INTO REVERSE OR PARK IT STILL LIGHTS UP AND DOESN'T TURN OFF UNLESS I RESTART MY ENGINE. I'VE RESEARCHED AND A LOT OF PEOPLE ARE HAVING THE SAME PROBLEM WITH THEIR JEEPS INCLUDING 2018 MODELS
